data.message:
演出位子已經滿了哦~
如果還有誰還在考慮或忘了留票，我們還可以多安排星期六場的兩個觀眾席哦。就星期六場兩個位子哦~~
趕快聯絡我們 012-2640258
Full house！ The 2 shows of IslanDShadE ate full house！
If you are still considering or forgot to reserve your seat, this is your last chance--we can still arrange 2 seats on Saturday's show. Hurry up, contact 012-2640258

【IslanD.ShadE】Rehearsal in progress~
5 days to go, 5 seats are left！
Be quick, grab our last 5 seats~

PM us or whatsapp 012-2640258to reserve your seats :)

【IslanD.ShadE】
16/12、17/12，8pm
Admission by donation，PM Pitapat Theatre or contact 012-2640258 to reserve your seats.
Seats are very limited, reserve fast~

【島。影】
16/12、17/12，8pm
樂捐入場，請pm卜卜劇場或聯絡012-2640258留位。位子非常有限，留位要快咯~

【IslanD。ShadE】

2 monologues, by 2 girls from 2 different island
Tell the stories behind the shades of Sabah, and Hongkong,
contemplating their identity, history and memories...

Created by Zizi (Sabah) and Kady (Hongkong)
Co-directed by Zizi, Kady, and SooMing

Come join us in Kampung Bahang, in coming December

Dates, Time：16/12、17/12/2016, 8pm
Venue：Pitapat Theatre Studio（Kampung Bahang）
Admission by donation（Yes, we accept from RM1 - RM100 or more~ )

【ShadE】

Writer & Actress -- Zizi Hau (Sabah)

Pitapat Theatre's actor. After graduate from secondary school she participated in Pitapat acting training courses, and acted in few Pitapat Theatre's production. Currently year 1st student in Singapore - "INTERCULTURAL THEATRE INSTITUTE" (diploma in acting) . Recent performance : 《Enter or Escape》,《The Wanted》,《An Enemy of the People。At the moment》,《EAT》。She also performed in Esplanade during moonfest 2016

【IslanD.ShadE】 - "Shade"

 People look at her with weird gaze whenever she acted differently from other people. As if they wanted to eat her up. She have no choice but to listen and obey. Now she is an office lady. One day when she was going home, she saw an accident...

【島。影】之“影”

她不乖的時候周圍的人都會用奇怪的眼神看著她，似乎要把她給吃了。她不得不聽話不得不聽從。現在她已是一個上班族。有天回家路上看見一場意外。。。

【IslanD.ShadE】-- “IslanD"

‘The weakest moment of a strong woman is that when being praised by other people for being strong when she is truly weak.’ 

The tremendous pressure from life, relationships and career is like big waves swallowing us deep down into the bottom of the angry sea, no matter how hard we struggle. Perhaps we maybe lucky to be brought by the waves onto the seashore of an island. We stay on this desolated island, it maybe a choice or just fate. However, if isolation is a way of self-salvation, the island, well, could be our final destination.

【島。影】之 “島”

堅強的女性最脆弱的時候，就是當她很脆弱的時候仍然被人稱讚她很堅強的時候。

來自生活、愛情、事業的壓力、失望和悲傷，就如大浪洶湧而來，不管她們如何掙扎，大海還是把她們捲入水底。後來，她們被沖上岸邊，來到島上。劫後餘生，她們留在這個荒島。這可能是命運，也可能是選擇。因為，如果孤立自己是一種救贖，這個孤島就是她們的安身之所。

【IslanD】 

Writer & Actress --  Kady Cheung (HongKong）

Graduated from Intercultural Theatre Institute (Singapore),  Chinese University Of HongKong, and received Certificate of Chinese Opera in HongKong Academy of Performing Arts.  Founder of "Artist Mission".  Kady has been performing in Austria, England, Malaysia, Taiwan etc.   Recent works: 《Art Studio》(Penang)、《Firefly》(HongKong)、《Little Island》(HongKong) etc.  Kady has been working on original plays concerning cultural and social issues in HongKong.

【影】 -- 编剧及演员

侯桂芝 Zizi Hau （沙巴）

卜卜剧场演员。中学毕业后加入卜卜剧场训练班，参演卜卜剧场多部戏剧演出。目前为新加坡 “跨文化戏剧学院” 一年级学生。近年演出作品包括：《Enter or Escape》、《门外汉》、《人民公敌。现在进行式》、《EAT》等等。

【島】 -- 編劇及演員

言瞳依 Kady Cheung (香港）

分別於新加坡跨文化學院及香港中文大學英文系畢業，獲香港演藝學院戲曲文憑，主修表演。Artist Mission創辦人。張氏曾遠赴澳地利、英國、馬來西亞、台灣等地方演出及與當地的藝術家交流。近年參與之演出包括：《畫室》(檳城)、影話戲《螢火》(香港)、《小島可以留情》(香港) 、《逆行於星塵間的光年鐵路》(香港)等等。近年更積極於編導及演出與香港社會文化有關的作品。

【島。影】 

一个沙巴人，一个香港人
两个来自不同島的女生的两部单人剧
12月，在卜卜剧场排练场上演

日期、时间：16/12、17/12/2016
地点：卜卜剧场排练场（Kampung Bahang）

凭乐捐入场。（对！从RM1到RM100我们都接受~ )
